Posts.Content: Nov 13, 2008 08:47AM davisfamily70 wrote: Oh you poor kid. Why did they not suspect that you had an antibiotic resistent infection right away. All they had to do was take a culture. I also had recurring infections and had to have my expanders removed. I waited until I was all done with chemo and had the expanders replaced successfully, then I waited 8 more months to have the implants. Hang in there honey, one day this will be a bad memory.
Posts.Title: Skin Mets too_young_momof2 too_young_momof2
